com.ulflander.mining
Class TextExtractor

java.lang.Object
  com.ulflander.mining.TextExtractor

public final class TextExtractor
extends Object

Class that create a document given various inputs: URL, raw string, file. Lot of different strategies/libraries are used depending on the kind of method called.

Since:
2/24/14
Author:
Ulflander

fromHTMLString

public static Document fromHTMLString(String str)
                               throws ExtractionException
Populate a new document with given string - extract content using Boilerpipe. Extractor used is CanolaExtractor (v1.2.0). Note that v1.2.0 is used but is not available on Maven, it's available as local maven library and can be installed using Makefile. Once text is extract, we execute the following: - Clean multiple spaces - Transform new lines to double new lines, so paragraph detection of DocumentSplitter processor can work - Use fromString method onto the resulting string - Populate doc with metadata from HTML if found Possible improvement here would be to add multiple strategies for text extraction, and try to compare quality of results, keeping only the "best match". Doc meta extraction is done using the MetaExtractor class and Jsoup.

Parameters:
str - String to process
Returns:
Document populated with text retrieved from URL
Throws:
ExtractionException - In case content is empty
See Also:
CanolaExtractor, MetaExtractor

fromString

public static Document fromString(String str)
                           throws ExtractionException
Populate a new document with given string - string is cleaned before. All lines are trimmed.

Returns:
Document populated with text retrieved from String
Throws:
ExtractionException - In case content is empty

fromString

public static Document fromString(String str,
                                  String fallback)
                           throws ExtractionException
Populate a new document with given string, if empty then use fallback.

Parameters:
str - String to process
fallback - Fallback string to process
Returns:
Document populated with text retrieved from String or fallback
Throws:
ExtractionException - If content is empty and there's no fallback
